#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,a[50],b[50],max,s;
    max = s = 0;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int j = 0;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        while(j<n)
            scanf("%d",&a[j++]);
        j = 0;
        while(j<n)
        {
            scanf("%d",&b[j]);
            s = 3*a[j] + b[j];
            if(s>max)
                max = s;
            j++;
        }
        printf("%d\n",max);
        max = s = 0;
    }
    return 0;
}
